_a-0000edb4-d4ac-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime
_a-0000edb4-d4ac-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!isStartOfDay,
  userdatetime(
    year(ri!dateValue),
    month(ri!dateValue),
    day(ri!dateValue),
    0,
    1
  ),
  userdatetime(
    year(ri!dateValue),
    month(ri!dateValue),
    day(ri!dateValue),
    23,
    59
  )
)

_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_HomePage_Sub_ExtractionModelGrid
_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!showGrid,
  {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnChartField"(
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:231c53d0-2ae0-4819-ae0a-372d31b4c766",
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      yAxisTitle: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:396bc6fa-092f-484e-948a-21d48eea366e",
      showWhen: isnull(local!showGrid),
      categories: index(
        ri!topExtractionModelDetails,
        recordType!AIA Extraction Model.name,
        null
      ),
      series: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(
        color: ri!brandingMap.Teal3,
        links: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!topExtractionModelDetails,
          expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(value: true, saveInto: local!showGrid)
        ),
        label: index(
          ri!topExtractionModelDetails,
          recordType!AIA Extraction Model.name,
          null
        ),
        data: index(
          ri!topExtractionModelDetails,
          recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionInstanceCount,
          null
        )
      ),
      showLegend: false,
      showTooltips: false
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      value: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
          linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
          showWhen: not(isnull(local!showGrid)),
          color: ri!brandingMap.Blue3,
          icon: "arrow-left",
          link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
            label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:c93f1aa7-8da2-4b25-bf5c-6b1d4658bfc5",
            saveInto: a!save(target: local!showGrid, value: null)
          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
            label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:c93f1aa7-8da2-4b25-bf5c-6b1d4658bfc5",
            saveInto: a!save(target: local!showGrid, value: null)
          ),
          linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
          color: ri!brandingMap.Blue3,
          text: " " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:c93f1aa7-8da2-4b25-bf5c-6b1d4658bfc5",
          showWhen: not(isnull(local!showGrid))
        )
      }
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
      showWhen: not(isnull(local!showGrid)),
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:e349de12-26ce-4f07-a2d6-818892336ae7"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:cd1d1493-da70-4c8d-a90a-53b50b533f19": #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:34f9dfa7-078c-4ec1-9534-9c12686132b9"
      ),
      accessibilityText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:e349de12-26ce-4f07-a2d6-818892336ae7"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:cd1d1493-da70-4c8d-a90a-53b50b533f19": #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:34f9dfa7-078c-4ec1-9534-9c12686132b9"
      ),
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      rowHeader: 1,
      data: ri!topExtractionModelDetails,
      columns: {
        /*Model*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:8b3e37cd-f1d6-4ed5-871a-154a1c7a0156",
          sortField: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.name,
          value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            value: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: fv!row[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.name],
                link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
                  label: fv!row[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.name],
                  recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Model,
                  identifier: fv!row[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.modelId]
                ),
                linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
                style: "STRONG",
                color: ri!brandingMap.Gray4
              )
            }
          )
        ),
        /*Fields*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:15d21e83-aadd-4b1f-9cdf-d9db8556efc3",
          sortField: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.fieldsCount,
          value: fv!row[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.fieldsCount],
          align: "END"
        ),
        /*Instances*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:396bc6fa-092f-484e-948a-21d48eea366e",
          sortField: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionInstanceCount,
          value: fv!row[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionInstanceCount],
          align: "END"
        ),
        /*Accuracy*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:1d85cd95-b854-411a-907a-67f3ec9b03bd",
          sortField: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy,
          value: a!localVariables(
            local!percentageAttributes: rule!AIA_UTIL_GetPercentageAttributes(
              brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
              value: fv!row[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy]
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
              value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: a!defaultValue(
                  index(
                    local!percentageAttributes,
                    "percentage",
                    null()
                  ),
                  "-"
                ),
                color: index(
                  local!percentageAttributes,
                  "textColor",
                  null()
                ),
                style: "STRONG"
              )
            )
          ),
          align: "CENTER"
        )
      },
      validations: {},
      refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
      initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionInstanceCount,
        ascending: false()
      ),
      shadeAlternateRows: false(),
      borderStyle: "LIGHT",
      pageSize: 5,
      spacing: "STANDARD"
    )
  }
)

_a-0000ee78-c4db-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Instance_ValidationTotal

_a-0000edd9-a94f-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Homepage_Sub_DisplayClassificationDetails

_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_UTIL_GetPercentageAttributes
_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!value,
  whenTrue: a!defaultValue(ri!isNotTracked, false),
  then: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray3,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray0,
    percentage: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9de5298b-f6d7-4784-88ee-66469af68930",
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray3
  ),
  /*If Percentage Greater for 1000*/
  whenTrue: ri!value > 1000,
  then: null,
  /*If Percentage is null*/
  whenTrue: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!value),
  then: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray3,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray0,
    percentage: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(value: ri!value),
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray3
  ),
  /*If Percentage is greater than .8*/
  whenTrue: ri!value > .8,
  then: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Green4,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Green1,
    percentage: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(value: ri!value),
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Green4
  ),
  /*If Percentage greater than .5*/
  whenTrue: ri!value > .5,
  then: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Yellow4,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Yellow1,
    percentage: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(value: ri!value),
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Yellow4
  ),
  /*If Percentage greater than .25*/
  whenTrue: ri!value > .25,
  then: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Orange4,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Orange1,
    percentage: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(value: ri!value),
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Orange4
  ),
  /*If Percentage is less than .25*/
  default: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Red4,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Red1,
    percentage: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(value: ri!value),
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Red4
  )
)

_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_ValidationErrorsGridDisplay

_a-0000ec1e-9975-8000-9bd6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_DisplayPercentage

_a-0000edd9-a94f-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_HomePage_Sub_ExtractionModelTokenGrid

_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_UTIL_LoadBrandingMap

_a-0000ec36-59aa-8000-9be0-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_ModelVersionName
_a-0000ec36-59aa-8000-9be0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!ModelVersion,
  whenTrue: runtimetypeof(ri!ModelVersion) = recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version,
  then: if(
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!ModelVersion[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.extractionModel.name]),
    ri!ModelVersion[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.extractionModel.name] & " - " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:0dc23859-ec54-488e-8e0e-54f234016331"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:6432df6d-081e-454e-a970-7f0e3444fc73": ri!ModelVersion[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.versionId]
    ),
    "-"
  ),
  whenTrue: runtimetypeof(ri!ModelVersion) = recordType!AIA Classification Model Version,
  then: if(
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!ModelVersion[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.model.name]),
    ri!ModelVersion[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.model.name] & " - " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:0dc23859-ec54-488e-8e0e-54f234016331"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:6432df6d-081e-454e-a970-7f0e3444fc73": ri!ModelVersion[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.versionId]
    ),
    "-"
  ),
  default: ""
)

_a-0000ed16-a792-8000-9c64-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
{
  a!map(
    value: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_CRITICAL,
    label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:0fdbc5bf-53b5-4561-bfbd-b271cac50c35",
    icon: "fire-alt",
    color: "Red4"
  ),
  a!map(
    value: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_HIGH,
    label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:e0e17633-3db4-46cb-ad07-96b5d97b3e8c",
    icon: "angle-double-up-bold",
    color: "Orange4"
  ),
  a!map(
    value: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_MEDIUM,
    label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:1c3e003d-2666-41cd-844f-3278b6e69a82",
    icon: "circle-o",
    color: "Yellow4"
  ),
  a!map(
    value: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_LOW,
    label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:2b0d9f01-f232-478f-bd9c-89f7158ed854",
    icon: "angle-double-down",
    color: "Green4"
  )
}

_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_HomePage_Extraction_GetHighRangeForImprovementData
AIA_HomePage_Classification_GetDataForAreaOfImprovements
_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!gridData: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordType_v1"(
    recordType: recordType!AIA Classification Model,
    fetchTotalCount: false(),
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: 3,
      sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy,
        ascending: true()
      )
    ),
    filters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy,
        operator: "not null"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Classification Model.createdOn,
        operator: "between",
        value: {ri!selectedInterval.currrentStartDate,ri!selectedInterval.currentEndDate}
      )
    }
  ).data,
  if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: local!gridData),
    {},
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!gridData,
      expression: if(
        fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy] >= .8,
        {},
        a!map(
          modelName: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.name],
          modelId: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.modelId],
          accuracy: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(
            value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy]
          ),
          backgroundColor: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Yellow1,
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange1,
              default: ri!brandingMap.Red1
            )
          ),
          icon: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: "exclamation-triangle",
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: "exclamation-triangle",
              default: "exclamation-circle"
            )
          ),
          color: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange4,
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange4,
              default: ri!brandingMap.Red4
            )
          ),
          highRange: concat(
            rule!AIA_HomePage_Classification_GetHighRangeForImprovementData(
              currentAccuracy: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy]
            ),
            "%"
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_HomePage_Classification_GetHighRangeForImprovementData

_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_ExtractionModel_RecordGrid

_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!gridData: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordType_v1"(
    recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Model,
    fetchTotalCount: false(),
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: 3,
      sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy,
        ascending: true()
      )
    ),
    filters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy,
        operator: "not null"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.createdOn,
        operator: "between",
        value: {ri!selectedInterval.currrentStartDate,ri!selectedInterval.currentEndDate}
      )
    }
  ).data,
  if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: local!gridData),
    {},
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!gridData,
      expression: if(
        fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy] >= .8,
        {},
        a!map(
          modelName: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.name],
          modelId: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.modelId],
          accuracy: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(
            value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy]
          ),
          backgroundColor: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Yellow1,
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange1,
              default: ri!brandingMap.Red1
            )
          ),
          icon: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: "exclamation-triangle",
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: "exclamation-triangle",
              default: "exclamation-circle"
            )
          ),
          color: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange4,
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange4,
              default: ri!brandingMap.Red4
            )
          ),
          highRange: concat(
            rule!AIA_HomePage_Extraction_GetHighRangeForImprovementData(
              currentAccuracy: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy]
            ),
            "%"
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Test_GetLatestExtractionInstance
_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AIA_Extraction_GetInstanceById(
  identifier: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordType_v3"(
    recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance,
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: 1,
      sort: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
          field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.id
        )
      }
    )
  ).data[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.id],
  additionalFields: {
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.instanceUuid,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.versionId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.modelId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.uuid,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.extractionModel.key,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentFolderId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fieldCount,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.sections,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.boundingBoxes,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.responseDocumentId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.sourceDocumentId
  }
)

_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Sitepage_Home

_a-0000edb4-d4ac-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_getIntervalsForDateFilter
_a-0000edb4-d4ac-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/* Data dictionary 
 * label (text) - display label of interval in dropdown
 
 *** example in AIA_ExtractionModelVersion_StraightThroughProcessingMetricsCard 
 *** for trend shaped directly by interval aggregation (not using weeks which are unsupported by query aggregation)
 * aggregationInterval (text) - a!grouping interval for querying data
 * intervalDates (List of Dates) - ordered list of all dates for aggregationInterval expected with currentStart/EndDate range.
 *     Must match expected style/return of selected aggregationInterval (i.e MONTH_DATE returns first day of each month within range)
 * intervalFormat (text) - text() style to use when formatting intervalDate for chart category 
 
 *** used in all interval queries
 * currrentStartDate (dateTime) - start datetime for current interval query filter
 * currrentEndDate (dateTime) - end datetime for current interval query filter
 
 *** used in token trends on homempage and prompt displays
 *** for non standard by-week groupings that can't be done automatically in queryAggregation
 * previousStartDate (dateTime) - start datetime for interval prior to current for diff calculation
 * previousEndDate (dateTime) - end datetime for interval prior to current for diff calculation
 * identifier (integer) - unique id for interval
 * secondaryKPILabel (text) - secondary display label
 * numWeeks (integer) - count of weeks within range for data seperation
 * weeklyGroups (List of Map) - list of start and end dates for each week in interval for custom aggregations
*/

a!localVariables(
  local!inputDate: today(),
  {
    a!map(
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:74a2a818-84a0-43c9-ae15-58edc9824c8d"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:426f489f-72ed-4a46-9227-3d761bca9382": 30
      ),
      aggregationInterval: "DATE",
      intervalDates: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: enumerate(30),
        expression: today() - 30 + fv!index
      ),
      intervalFormat: "mmm dd",
      currrentStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 29,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      currentEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false()),
      previousStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 59,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      previousEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 30,
        isStartOfDay: false()
      ),
      identifier: 1,
      secondaryKPILabel: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:03b3e703-00ee-4b8b-8f83-9209337d9407"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:d41a5125-5a98-418d-8f23-c9949dc2144c": 30
      ),
      numWeeks: 4,
      weeklyGroups: append(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: enumerate(4),
          expression: {
            startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 29,
              isStartOfDay: true()
            ) + (7 * fv!item),
            endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 29,
              isStartOfDay: false()
            ) + (7 * fv!item + 6)
          }
        ),
        {
          startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
            dateValue: today() - 1,
            isStartOfDay: true()
          ),
          endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false())
        }
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:74a2a818-84a0-43c9-ae15-58edc9824c8d"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:426f489f-72ed-4a46-9227-3d761bca9382": 60
      ),
      aggregationInterval: "DATE",
      intervalDates: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: enumerate(60),
        expression: today() - 60 + fv!index
      ),
      intervalFormat: "mmm dd",
      currrentStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 59,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      currentEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false),
      previousStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 119,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      previousEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 60,
        isStartOfDay: false()
      ),
      identifier: 2,
      secondaryKPILabel: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:03b3e703-00ee-4b8b-8f83-9209337d9407"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:d41a5125-5a98-418d-8f23-c9949dc2144c": 60
      ),
      numWeeks: 8,
      weeklyGroups: append(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: enumerate(8),
          expression: {
            startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 59,
              isStartOfDay: true()
            ) + (7 * fv!item),
            endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 59,
              isStartOfDay: false()
            ) + (7 * fv!item + 6)
          }
        ),
        {
          startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
            dateValue: today() - 3,
            isStartOfDay: true()
          ),
          endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false())
        }
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:74a2a818-84a0-43c9-ae15-58edc9824c8d"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:426f489f-72ed-4a46-9227-3d761bca9382": 90
      ),
      aggregationInterval: "DATE",
      intervalDates: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: enumerate(90),
        expression: today() - 90 + fv!index
      ),
      intervalFormat: "mmm dd",
      currrentStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 89,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      currentEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false()),
      previousStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 179,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      previousEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 90,
        isStartOfDay: false()
      ),
      identifier: 3,
      secondaryKPILabel: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:03b3e703-00ee-4b8b-8f83-9209337d9407"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:d41a5125-5a98-418d-8f23-c9949dc2144c": 90
      ),
      numWeeks: 12,
      weeklyGroups: append(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: enumerate(12),
          expression: {
            startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 89,
              isStartOfDay: true()
            ) + (7 * fv!item),
            endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 89,
              isStartOfDay: false()
            ) + (7 * fv!item + 6)
          }
        ),
        {
          startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
            dateValue: today() - 5,
            isStartOfDay: true()
          ),
          endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false())
        }
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:f5eca8bb-66c4-4925-9a10-c2a74b4a1227",
      aggregationInterval: "MONTH_DATE",
      intervalDates: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: enumerate(
          elapsedmonths(
            rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: date(year(today()), 1, 1),
              isStartOfDay: true()
            ),
            now()
          ) + 1
        ),
        expression: date(year(today()),fv!index, 1)
      ),
      intervalFormat: "mmm",
      currrentStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: date(year(today()), 1, 1),
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      currentEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false()),
      previousStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: date(year(today()) - 1, 1, 1),
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      previousEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: date(year(today()) - 1, 12, 31),
        isStartOfDay: false()
      ),
      identifier: 4,
      secondaryKPILabel: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:7922f723-db73-4942-8297-0cf80875e5ff"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:268d5356-d5df-4932-92dc-91ecd7ede39f": #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:442ac098-88b9-4378-bd5f-c48386e12292"
      ),
      numWeeks: 0,
      weeklyGroups: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: enumerate(month(local!inputDate)),
        expression: {
          label: text(
            date(year(local!inputDate), fv!item + 1, 1),
            "MMM"
          ),
          startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
            dateValue: date(year(local!inputDate), fv!item + 1, 1),
            isStartOfDay: true()
          ),
          endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
            dateValue: eomonth(
              date(year(local!inputDate), fv!item + 1, 1),
              0
            ),
            isStartOfDay: false()
          )
        }
      )
    )
  }
)

_a-0000ee78-c4db-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Template_HeadingAndContents

_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_HomePage_Sub_ClassificationModelGrid
_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(

  local!showGrid,
  {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnChartField"(
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:b33f39d8-4522-4329-bf2b-d489dda7bb5d",
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      yAxisTitle: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:396bc6fa-092f-484e-948a-21d48eea366e",
      showWhen: isnull(local!showGrid),
      categories: index(
        ri!topClassificationModelDetails,
        recordType!AIA Classification Model.name,
        null
      ),
      series: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(
        color:ri!brandingMap.Teal3,
        links: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(items:ri!topClassificationModelDetails,expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(value: true, saveInto: local!showGrid)),
        label: index(
          ri!topClassificationModelDetails,
          recordType!AIA Classification Model.name,
          null
        ),
        data: index(
          ri!topClassificationModelDetails,
          recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedVersionInstanceCount,
          null
        )
      ),
      showLegend: false,
      showTooltips: false()
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(value:
    {#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
      linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
      showWhen: not(isnull(local!showGrid)),
      color: ri!brandingMap.Blue3,
      icon:"arrow-left",
      link:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
        label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:c93f1aa7-8da2-4b25-bf5c-6b1d4658bfc5",
        saveInto: a!save(target: local!showGrid, value: null),

      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      link:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
        label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:c93f1aa7-8da2-4b25-bf5c-6b1d4658bfc5",
        saveInto: a!save(target: local!showGrid, value: null),

      ),
      linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
      color: ri!brandingMap.Blue3,
      text: " "&#"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:c93f1aa7-8da2-4b25-bf5c-6b1d4658bfc5",
      showWhen: not(isnull(local!showGrid))
    )}),

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v2"(
      showWhen: not(isnull(local!showGrid)),
      accessibilityText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:e349de12-26ce-4f07-a2d6-818892336ae7"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:cd1d1493-da70-4c8d-a90a-53b50b533f19": #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:45facea2-44a0-44d8-b555-babf57c98a02"
      ),
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      data: ri!topClassificationModelDetails,
      columns: {
        /*Model*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:8b3e37cd-f1d6-4ed5-871a-154a1c7a0156",
          sortField: recordType!AIA Classification Model.name,
          value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            value: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: fv!row[recordType!AIA Classification Model.name],
                link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
                  label: fv!row[recordType!AIA Classification Model.name],
                  recordType: recordType!AIA Classification Model,
                  identifier: fv!row[recordType!AIA Classification Model.modelId]
                ),
                linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
                style: "STRONG",
                color: ri!brandingMap.Gray4,

              )
            }
          )
        ),
        /*Fields*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:1b70fe4e-16c8-4dc8-90c0-094ca2ed8e4d",
          sortField: recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedCategoryCount,
          value: fv!row[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedCategoryCount],
          align: "END"
        ),
        /*Instances*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:396bc6fa-092f-484e-948a-21d48eea366e",
          sortField: recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedVersionInstanceCount,
          value: fv!row[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedVersionInstanceCount],
          align: "END"
        ),
        /*Accuracy*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:1d85cd95-b854-411a-907a-67f3ec9b03bd",
          sortField: recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy,
          value: a!localVariables(
            local!percentageAttributes: rule!AIA_UTIL_GetPercentageAttributes(
              brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
              value: fv!row[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy]
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
              value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: a!defaultValue(
                  index(
                    local!percentageAttributes,
                    "percentage",
                    null()
                  ),
                  "-"
                ),
                color: index(
                  local!percentageAttributes,
                  "textColor",
                  null()
                ),
                style: "STRONG"
              )
            )
          ),
          align: "CENTER"
        ),

      },
      validations: {},
      refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
      initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedVersionInstanceCount,
        ascending: false()
      ),
      shadeAlternateRows: false(),
      borderStyle: "LIGHT",
      pageSize: 5,
      spacing: "STANDARD"
    )
  }
)
